children.value: Average utilization per flight, per route
Competition – are we the only ones affected by this?
It is important to understand if the client has a preference for any pricing models? If not, value-based pricing is most common and we can proceed with it.

Customers have an idea of how much it would be reasonable to pay for a product, with this being quantified as an expected price. Perceived value is fundamentally personal and different individuals will be willing to pay different prices for the same product.
